heading: Usage
html: Stick to the top

heading: Position
html: Stick to the bottom

heading: Start
html:
200px
100%
20vh
Selector

heading: End
html:
200px
100%
20vh
Selector

heading: Offset
html: Stick 200px below the top

heading: Animation
html: Animation Slide Top

heading: Show On Up
html: Slide in on scroll up

heading: Responsive
html: Only be sticky on viewports larger than 640px.

heading: Overflow Flip
html:
overflow-flip: true
end: 100%
Cover previous section.
Reveal next section.
position: bottom
overflow-flip: true
start: -100%
end: 0
